#This page contains the release notes information for CloudBuddy 1.4 Beta

= ReleaseNotes =

Cloudbuddy_SetUp_1.4 Beta has been released with the following features and issues fixed. 


= New Features =

  # Support for multiple views (FileView and MailView)
  # Mail Explorer in Oulook Plugin
  # Right Click Copy public/private URI to clipboard
  # Share History can be tracked and managed



= Issues Fixed = 

 # Plug-in not being loaded in some machines during Ms-Office applications startup
 # File upload shows wrong progress
 # API related dll's are bundled together
